comment.note: RIO DE JANEIRO, BRAZIL - AUGUST 08: Michael Phelps of the United States competes in the Men's 200m Butterfly heat on Day 3 of the Rio 2016 Olympic Games at the Olympic Aquatics Stadium on August 8, 2016 in Rio de Janeiro, Brazil. (Photo by Laurence Griffiths/Getty Images)
